text:
Bibir Sanemi terbungkam rapat. Deru napasnya memberat. Setiap inci sentuhan Giyuu di kulitnya terasa begitu mencekik, membuatnya sulit menghirup udara. Ada rasa mual yang menggelitik perutnya ketika lidah Giyuu mengambil peran. Menjijikan. Pemuda itu kemudian melongkarkan cengkramannya, membiarkan Giyuu membalik posisi diantara mereka berdua.
Dan sebelum jemari Giyuu menelusuri lekuk celana Sanemi, suara pemuda itu duluan memecah keheningan. "Aku bukan Tanjirou atau Sabito. Aku bukan dua-duanya."
Tatapan Giyuu menerawang, namun tangannya tidak berhenti. Sekujur tubuh pemuda itu seolah mati rasa. Baik hati maupun jiwanya, semuanya kosong. Tidak ada apa-apa yang bisa diisi. Tidak ada Sanemi disana.
Jeans jatuh ke lantai. Giyuu menciumi tengkuk Sanemi, menghirupnya, berusaha menemukan sesuatu disana. Sela-sela jari Sanemi mengapit helai rambut Giyuu.
trans:
Sanemi's lips were tightly sealed. His breathing became heavier. Every inch of Giyuu's touch on his skin felt so suffocating, making it hard for him to breathe. A wave of nausea tickled his stomach when Giyu's tongue took control. Disgusting. The young man loosened his grip, letting Giyuu reverse positions between the two of them.
And before Giyuu's fingers traced the curve of Sanemi's pants, the man's voice broke the silence first, "I'm not Tanjirou or Sabito. I'm neither of them."
Giyuu's gaze wandered, but his hands didn't stop. Every inch of the young man's body felt numb. His heart and soul were empty. There was nothing to fill the void. Sanemi was not there.
The jeans fell to the floor. Giyuu kissed Sanemi's nape, inhaling it, trying to find something there. Sanemi's fingers tangled in a strand of Giyuu's hair.
